extendedInfo.description: THE ONLY 39 CROSS LANGUAGE PICTURE DICTIONARY FOR ANDROID!Cross language means that you can translate between any of the 39 built-in languages with no limit! You can translate words from Korean to Russian or even Vietnamese to Slovak instantly. NO NEED FOR AN INTERNET CONNECTION OR 3G â the entire app comes pre-loaded with everything you need for studying, traveling, or anything on the go.The Languages in this app include:EnglishAlbanianArabicArmenian BosnianBulgarianChineseCroatianCzechDanishDutchEstonianFarsiFinnishFrenchGermanGreekHebrewHindiHungarianIndonesianItalianJapaneseKoreanLatvianLithuanianNorwegianPolish PortugueseRomanianRussianSerbianSlovakSpanish SwedishThaiTurkishUkrainian VietnameseEach word has a corresponding picture and FLUENT HUMAN PRONUNCIATION so you can memorize it easier and even have a pic to reference it to.Visit Ectaco at www.ectaco.com or Lingvosoft at www.lingvosoft.com for the best language learning hardware and software.__________tags: ectaco, lingvosoft, trip, travel, talking, speaking, speech, pronunciation, dictionary, dictionaries, translate, language, learning, translation, software, reference, translator, ÑÐ»Ð¾Ð²Ð°ÑÑ, ÑÐ»Ð¾Ð²Ð°ÑÐ¸, Ð¿ÐµÑÐµÐ²Ð¾Ð´, ÑÐ·ÑÐº, Ð°Ð½Ð³Ð»Ð¸Ð¹ÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹, ÑÑÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹, Ð°ÑÐ´Ð¸Ð¾ Ð¿ÑÐ¾Ð¸Ð·Ð½Ð¾ÑÐµÐ½Ð¸Ðµ, Ð³Ð¾Ð²Ð¾ÑÑÑÐ¸Ð¹, Ð¿ÑÑÐµÑÐµÑÑÐ²Ð¸Ðµ, Ð¼ÑÐ»ÑÑÐ¸ÑÐ·ÑÑÐ½ÑÐ¹

reviews.title: Good idea - not well implemented
reviews.comment: The voices are so low on my HTC Sensation that you can not hear them even at full volume. Uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'m unistalling it again because it keeps giving an error when my device startd, and that\'s very annoying. Sorry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App, Awesome For Translations
reviews.comment: Instead of buying up a few languages i decided to get this app to check out its translation possibility. Very awesome and very useful to those who need translation fast and especially with this many languages its a great find. BTW, my screen doesnt lock and theres no error message. It actually works perfectly which is a big plus too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Bad; Needs some additions
reviews.comment: It has many categories and it\'s good for those who want to learn basic vocabulary from other languages. It runs smoothly on my Asus Eee Pad Transformer. However, it needs some additions especially in the category of buildings; something like school, place of worship, etc. Antonyms category needs more additions as well; the lists are so short. It\'s not interactive; adding some tools like flash card would enhance its effectiveness. Overall, it\'s good for tourists and I kinda liked it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does NOT work when network not available!
reviews.comment: The darn app quit on me when I most needed it - traveling in other country! It stopped working after I restarted the device and network was not available.   Therefore I\'m giving it lowest rating. I guess developer get\'s greedy on licensing, requiring network connectivity to validate license. Guess what - network most of the times are not valuable when one travels abroad.   ---- Developer, please, fix it by removing network-hungry option that causes crashes. People using it while traveling. It shall work reliably for months  even when network is not available! Also, a phrasebook will be nice. Please consider including it.
reviews.author: Paul KeBets

reviews.comment: Instantly forces the screenlock on on my phone. Unusable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app. Easy to use. Easy to learn simple words of any new language!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: George Forces instant lock on the main screen please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User
